summary: Fixed missing 'admin.' prefix in route names in help index view. All 5 route references updated from 'beautybooking.help.*' to 'admin.beautybooking.help.*' to match RouteServiceProvider configuration. This prevents 'Route not found' errors when clicking help guide links.
current_status: All route references in help index view now correctly include 'admin.' prefix. Routes match the RouteServiceProvider configuration where admin routes are prefixed with 'admin.' (line 62). All 5 help guide links will now work correctly.
